content: I see that HAPI allows the addition on an 'id' field to an extension. In the HL7 spec I only see url and value specified. Is this a bug or is it valid to add an id field to an extension?
This id is coming from here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/element.html
This is not a resource Id, it is an id to identify an element inside of resource (xml:id)
So am I interpreting it correctly that everything in FHIR has an id field?
